programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris tries to move on by finding a job and starting a business. Meanwhile, Basti makes a deal with Jomar, and Ali plans to tell Greggy his secret—until fate delays him again.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian foils George's drug delivery and encourages Caloy to leave the syndicate. Fed up with Rhian's interference in his drug smuggling business, George puts Caloy's loyalty to the test by commanding him to get rid of the thorn in their side. Rhian makes a bold move in hopes of saving Eugene's grandson from the syndicate.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Following Marcial's order, Jessie tries to look for Rhian in Pampanga. Though her attempt turned futile, she eventually stumbles upon a lead that could bring her closer to Rhian's whereabouts and Pascal's allies. Rhian, on the other hand, receives a pleasant surprise from her friends from Barrio Sto. Francisco. Unknown to her, trouble is just lurking around the corner.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Romina becomes indignant upon learning that her rape case is dismissed. She later discovers that Robert kept mum about Daniela and Hector's connection. Filled with rage and disappointment, Romina leaves the Mondragon mansion. After Alvin’s release from jail, Hector carries out a plan to get rid of Robert immediately. Soon, a shocking news about Robert reaches Romina.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Carlos tries to talk to Romina about her accusation against Daniela and gets into a heated confrontation with his wife after seeing Romina’s proof that she is involved with Hector. Meanwhile, Robert is convinced that someone is attempting to take his life. Because of this, Robert confronts Alvin over his suspicion that the latter has something to do with the car accident.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Sonya Alipio, a single mother of two boys, finds herself pointing a gun toward a man in a cemetery, faced with a difficult decision to kill a stranger so that her son, Paco, can live.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Relieved that her son is far from danger, Sonya decides to keep her word and heads to the police station to turn herself in for the crime she has committed.

programme.title: Always Be My Maybe
programme.desc: A make-up artist recovering from a breakup, relunctantly begins a relationship with a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: During the triathlon event, Gabriel meets Carlos, but Carlos's personality leaves a bad impression on him. Gabriel is surprised to see someone who resembles his dear friend. Meanwhile, Bianca arrives in Zambales, hoping to find the Villorias.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Sonya and Domeng attend to Asyong and Unyo as the two move into their home. Meanwhile, thinking that the Lamostes have plotted against Gabriel's life, Carolina confronts and assaults Jean. Enraged for meddling with his plans, Jacob then beats Roman.

programme.title: Kasal
programme.desc: A woman, who is set to marry an eligible bachelor and budding politician, is forced to deal with an ex-boyfriend who is hell-bent on winning her back.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: An incident forces Iris and Basti to work together on an event, stirring discomfort as they struggle with the tension of being around each other.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris crosses paths with her father. Meanwhile, Ali tries to convince himself that he’s moved on from Basti.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian finds herself at the mercy of Buddy and his minions. She manages to elude Buddy's grasp and engineers his eventual arrest. Showing no signs of slowing down, Rhian also looks for files that could confirm her suspicion that Buddy is connected with Sec. Banzon, a high-profile politician. Marcial tries to squeeze the truth out of Buddy regarding his connection with Tiago and the politician in question.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Amelia takes matters into her own hands and orders Ramon to kill Rhian and to spy on Tiago. Meanwhile, Marcial and Ethan try to discern Rhian's involvement in Buddy's arrest. Later, Rhian sneaks into Sec. Banzon's mansion to find some evidence. At the same time, Marcial arrives with his troop and the police to hand Sec. Banzon an arrest warrant. Meanwhile, Jessie continues to pursue Rhian in Bataan.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert resolves to admit the truth once and for all which does not sit well with Daniela, who worries that her father will reveal her crimes against Romina. Robert informs his wife of his decision and asks her to meet him at the police station. Unknown to them, Hector is pulling some strings to thwart the Mondragon patriarch’s plans.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert’s loved ones are frantic with worry as they wait for updates from the search and rescue operation. An emotional Marga finds herself in another clash with Cassie, who is trying her best to keep calm amid the horrendous tragedy. Meanwhile, Romina refuses to accept the possibility of Robert's death. Soon after, Romina passes out upon learning that foul play was involved in the incident.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Jean's attention is drawn away from Sonia when Gabriel, the man wrongfully accused of killing Edward, appeals for justice. Meanwhile, Paco and Anna kick off their getaway gtrip to Baler by visiting Edward's grave.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: With the recent developments on Edward's case, Jean is forced to put her advocacy on hold but remains determined to help the policy holders, especially Sonya. Meanwhile, Jacob and Roman begin to take measures to keep their dirty secrets hidden.

programme.title: Kasal
programme.desc: A woman, who is set to marry an eligible bachelor and budding politician, is forced to deal with an ex-boyfriend who is hell-bent on winning her back.

programme.title: Till I Met You

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Somewhere along the West Philippine Sea, a foreign vessel captures a group of fishermen and accuses them of smuggling drugs. 2nd Lt. Rhian Bonifacio gets shot after sneaking in the vessel to rescue the fishermen.

programme.desc: Robert resolves to admit the truth once and for all which does not sit well with Daniela, who worries that her father will reveal her crimes against Romina.
